channel.title: SunBurstPool's RSS Feed
channel.description: Sunburst Pools a Central Ohio Pool Builder & Pool Service Company

item.title: 186 Above Ground
item.description: Elevate your backyard experience with the 186 Above-Ground Hybrid Pool! Engineered for durability and minimal maintenance, this model…
item.content:encoded:
Elevate your backyard experience with the 186 Above-Ground Hybrid Pool! Engineered for durability and minimal maintenance, this model features high-quality 7” extruded resin top seats and galvanized steel uprights. Its hybrid construction provides enhanced stability and resistance to water pressure, making it both practical and stylish. Available in various sizes and configurations, the 186 perfectly balances quality, aesthetics, and functionality. Backed by a 25-year pro-rated warranty, it promises long-term enjoyment for the entire family.

Hybrid Design: Combines resin and galvanized steel for enhanced durability and corrosion resistance.

Modern Aesthetics: Sleek design with a choice of attractive wall patterns for a stylish backyard setup.

Easy Maintenance: Resin components resist fading and require minimal upkeep.

Enhanced Stability: Double post buttress assembly for improved resistance to water pressure.

Versatile Sizes: Available in both round and oval configurations to suit different spaces.

Special Features

Resin top seats for strength, support and stability.

Exclusive to the 186, the double post assembly for straight wall section in oval models offer improved resistance to water pressure, yet retains a certain elegance. Made of painted galvanized steel, the bottom track offers greater stability.

  • Bottom safety track
  • Steel top seats joint plate
  • Steel uprights
  • Galvanized steel support post
  • Double post buttress assembly

Structural specifications

  1. 7” (17.80 cm) extruded resin top seat
  2. Steel coping
  3. Resin seat cap
  4. Steel joint plate
  5. Steel upright
  6. 52” (1.32 m) steel wall

Steel wall specifications

  1. Plasticized SP coating
  2. Molten zinc coat
  3. Primer coat
  4. Application of an alkaline solution to cleanse the oxides
  5. Galvanized steel wall core
  6. Chromate anti-rust coat
  7. Heat-hardened inlay
  8. Ultra-resistant polymer

Round Frame Style

Available sizes (ft): 8’ 10’ 12’ 15’ 18’ 21’ 24’ 27’ 30’

Oval A-Frame Style

Available sizes (ft): 10’x19’ 12’x24’ 15’x24’ 15’x30’ 18’x33’

item.title: 106 Above Ground
item.description: Experience summer fun with the 106 Above-Ground Steel Series Pool! Designed for those seeking a well-built pool focused on longevity and…
item.content:encoded:
Experience summer fun with the 106 Above-Ground Steel Series Pool! Designed for those seeking a well-built pool focused on longevity and stability, this model features durable galvanized steel components, including 7” painted steel top seats and 6” steel uprights for enhanced strength and stability. With a sleek design and multiple size options, it’s perfect for relaxation or play. The 106 combines quality, style, and practicality, making it an ideal choice for any backyard oasis.

Easy Installation and Budget-Friendly: Ideal for families seeking a cost-effective backyard retreat.

Durable Construction: Features galvanized steel components, including a steel top seats joint plate and double post buttress assembly for enhanced water pressure resistance.

Versatile Design Options: Available in multiple sizes, including round and oval configurations.

25-Year Warranty: Offers peace of mind with long-term durability.

Special Features

Steel top seats for strength, support and stability.

Exclusive to the 106, the double post assembly for straight wall section in oval models offer improved resistance to water pressure, yet retains a certain elegance. Made of painted galvanized steel, the bottom track offers greater stability.

  • Bottom safety track
  • Steel top seats joint plate
  • Steel uprights
  • Galvanized steel support post
  • Double post buttress assembly

Structural specifications

  1. 7” Painted Galvanized Steel Top Seats
  2. 2-Piece Injected Resin Top Caps
  3. 6” Painted Galvanized Steel Uprights
    • Available in 52”
    • Tubular Galvanized Steel Top Tracks
    • Galvanized Steel Top Connectors
    • Resin Foot Collars/Connectors Combo
    • Galvanized Steel Painted Bottom Track

Steel wall specifications

  1. Plasticized SP coating
  2. Molten zinc coat
  3. Primer coat
  4. Application of an alkaline solution to cleanse the oxides
  5. Galvanized steel wall core
  6. Chromate anti-rust coat
  7. Heat-hardened inlay
  8. Ultra-resistant polymer

Round Frame Style

Available sizes (ft): 8’ 10’ 12’ 15’ 18’ 21’ 24’ 27’ 30’

Oval A-Frame Style

Available sizes (ft): 12’x24’ 15’x24’ 15’x30’ 18’x33’

item.title: Downtown AG steel
item.description: The ash-toned wood and charcoal shades of the DOWNTOWN model is a top choice to provide your outdoor decor with a rustic and elegant style…
item.content:encoded:
The ash-toned wood and charcoal shades of the DOWNTOWN model is a top choice to provide your outdoor decor with a rustic and elegant style.

Designed to stand the test of time, this pool is our most prestigious. Its authentic and iconic style will transform your outdoor space into an urban and convivial environment. This series has the widest and strongest top ledges and vertical supports in our collection. It is compatible with our wide selection of lights and water features that the whole family will assuredly get the most of.

Features

Graduated rail

Multiple layers of protection

Ajustable ledge covers

Stable & high wall rail

Snap in uprights

Thick & robust ledges

Integrated tubing & wire management

Strong bottom plate connection

15'

item.title: 211 Above Ground
item.description: This high-end 211 Above Ground pool is definitely in a league of its own! 211 Above Ground pool features improved stability and resistance…
item.content:encoded:
This high-end 211 Above Ground pool is definitely in a league of its own! 211 Above Ground pool features improved stability and resistance to soil movement thanks to its exclusive and uniquely designed secur-lock bottom track. With its wide superior quality resin top seat and its elegant uprights, the 211 Above Ground is sure to be the highlight of your summer!

Special Features

  • Streamline oval systems for smaller backyards.
  • Easier to install due to less nuts and bolts.
  • Bottom mounted pressure plates to hold pool firmly on ground.
  • Painted galvanized steel buttress posts are re-enforced with steel splice brackets on each side for extra strength and stability.

Structural specifications

  1. 7” Extruded Resin Top Seats
  2. 2-Piece Injected Resin Top Caps
  3. Multicolored LED Solar Lights (optional)
  4. 7” Injected Resin Uprights
    • Available in 52”
    • Injected Resin Top and Bottom Tracks
    • Injected Resin Top and Bottom Connectors

Steel wall specifications

  1. Plasticized SP coating
  2. Molten zinc coat
  3. Primer coat
  4. Application of an alkaline solution to cleanse the oxides
  5. Galvanized steel wall core
  6. Chromate anti-rust coat
  7. Heat-hardened inlay
  8. Ultra-resistant polymer

Round Frame Style

Available sizes (ft): 12’ 15’ 18’ 21’ 24’ 27’ 30’

NBS Oval Frame Style

Available sizes (ft): 12’x18’ 12’x21’ 12’x24’ 15’x24’ 15’x30’ 18’x33’

Oval A-Frame Style

Available sizes (ft): 12’x18’ 12’x21’ 12’x24’ 15’x24’ 15’x30’ 18’x33’

item.content:encoded:
With its bleached wood finish, the Whitewood model offers a refreshing look that will complement your modern, upscale environment.

The Whitewood model possesses classic and timeless lines. The different wall finishes inspired by current trends allow this series to beautify and complement your yard. Its specific features, along with the unique ruggedness and reliability, will give you peace of mind for years to come. This series is compatible with our wide selection of illuminated water features.

item.title: The Sun Holiday IG
item.description: We at Sunburst Pools, know pools. Our experience in designing and manufacturing superior quality wooden in ground pools provides you with…
item.content:encoded:
We at Sunburst Pools, know pools. Our experience in designing and manufacturing superior quality wooden in ground pools provides you with the widest range of shapes and sizes to meet your individual needs.

Sun Holiday Inground Pool Specifications

Pressure Treated Wood Sidewalls

A Sun Holiday Pool is constructed with three quarter inch pressure treated wood sidewalls.The wood is impregnated with preservatives to resist decay and termites - even when in direct contact with the ground. Lifetime Warranty to the original consumer purchaser (See Warranty Certificate). Wood sidewalls act as a natural insulator which makes the temperature of the pool water warmer than in pools constructed of other materials. All in ground pools include gravel back fill and a water drainage tile system.

Bracing System

A Sun Holiday Pool is braced every two feet with pressure treated four inch x four inch beams when concrete or paver decks are used. Aalternating two inch x four inch manufactured gussets and four inch x four inch beams are used when a wooden deck is installed. In addition to the pressure treated wood braces, a Sun Holiday Pool utilizes an extensive four inch Structural Steel base and top with an angle iron corner support system incorporated within the construction.

Coping

Sun Holiday Pools come with aluminum coping which offers a liner-lock design. This unique design prevents the liner from pulling loose. Unlike other plastic or PVC coping, the aluminum coping is built to last a lifetime.

Insulation Foam

A Sun Holiday Pool sidewall is further insulated with foam insulation serving two purposes: it insulates the pool which makes the pool water warmer, and it protects the liner from the sidewalls. The insulation foam are designed to last for decades.

Premium Liner

Manufactured in the USA from premium quality virgin vinyl, the liner is designed with enough flexibility to fit attractively into a pool, yet strong enough to last for years. All seams and edges are lap welded electronically by a special process, and designs are the result of extensive research and experience.

Plumbing

All fittings are schedule 40-80 products made of durable PVC material. All Sun Holiday Pools are equipped with fully adjustable return wall fittings that direct the filtered water flow to any area of the pool for optimum circulation. A molded, non-corrosive automatic surface skimmer helps to keep the water’s surface free of debris. All plumbing lines are made up of PVC pipe for durability and longevity.

Filter and Pump

All pool filters and pumps fittings are Hayward Products to give our pool owners more control over their pools and a better swimming experience day and night.

Decks

Several optional deck designs and materials are available. A standard four foot walk around concrete comes standard.

Steps

Standard drop-in steps with handrail come with each pool. Optional built-in designs are available.

Sun Holiday Pools Offers the standard pool sizes of:

12’ x 20’

12’ x 24’

16’ x 24’

16’ x 32’

All pools come standard with the 48” depth. Optional deep ends and custom sizes are available.

item.title: The Sun Holiday AG
item.description: We at Sunburst Pools, know pools. Our experience in designing and manufacturing superior quality wooden above-ground pools provides you…
item.content:encoded:
We at Sunburst Pools, know pools. Our experience in designing and manufacturing superior quality wooden above-ground pools provides you with the widest range of shapes and sizes to meet your individual needs.

Sun Holiday Above Ground Pool Specifications

Pressure Treated Wood Sidewalls

A Sun Holiday Pool is constructed with three quarter inch pressure treated wood sidewalls.The wood is impregnated with preservatives to resist decay and termites - even when in direct contact with the ground. Lifetime Warranty to the original consumer purchaser (See Warranty Certificate). Wood sidewalls act as a natural insulator which makes the temperature of the pool water warmer than in pools constructed of other materials.

Bracing System

A Sun Holiday Pool is braced every two feet with alternating pressure treated four inch x four inch beams and two inch x four inch manufactured gussets, unlike other pools that are braced every four or eight feet. In addition to the pressure treated wood braces, a Sun Holiday Pool utilizes an extensive four inch Structural Steel base and top with an angle iron corner support system incorporated within the construction.

Coping

Sun Holiday Pools come with aluminum coping which offers a liner-lock design. This unique design prevents the liner from pulling loose. Unlike other plastic or PVC coping, the aluminum coping is built to last a lifetime.

Insulation Foam

A Sun Holiday Pool sidewall is further insulated with foam insulation serving two purposes: it insulates the pool which makes the pool water warmer, and it protects the liner from the sidewalls. The insulation foam are designed to last for decades.

Premium Liner

Manufactured in the USA from premium quality virgin vinyl, the liner is designed with enough flexibility to fit attractively into a pool, yet strong enough to last for years. All seams and edges are lap welded electronically by a special process, and designs are the result of extensive research and experience.

Plumbing

All fittings are schedule 40-80 products made of durable PVC material. All Sun Holiday Pools are equipped with fully adjustable return wall fittings that direct the filtered water flow to any area of the pool for optimum circulation. A molded, non-corrosive automatic surface skimmer helps to keep the water’s surface free of debris. All plumbing lines are made up of PVC pipe for durability and longevity.

Filter and Pump

All pool filters and pumps fittings are Hayward Products to give our pool owners more control over their pools and a better swimming experience day and night.

Deck Cover

A heavy-duty,all weather, indoor-outdoor carpet is included with all Sun Holiday Pools. Optional all wood decking is also available.

Pool Safety Sign

This sign urges swimmers to heed pool safety practices in order to avoid serious personal injury. The pool safety sign is made of weather resistant plastic material.

Sun Holiday Pools Offers the standard pool sizes of:

12’ x 20’

12’ x 24’

16’ x 24’

16’ x 32’

All pools come standard with the 48” depth. Optional deep ends and custom sizes are available.

item.title: Why Wood Pools?
item.description: The Features of A Wooden Pool Wood has natural qualities which are well-suited to pool sidewalls — it is easily handled and easily worked…
item.content:encoded:
The Features of A Wooden Pool

Wood has natural qualities which are well-suited to pool sidewalls — it is easily handled and easily worked, it can be modified on-site, and it offers resilience to help prevent damage caused by ground freezing and thawing. Because of its excellent workability and reduced dependence on ideal weather, a pool with wood sidewalls can generally be installed in less time than other types of pool materials used, resulting in greater financial savings to the pool owner.

Advantages of Pressure Treated Wood

When properly pressure-treated, wood also has durability. The pressure-treated lumbers used in our pools are impregnated with preservatives to resist decay and termites even when in direct contact with the ground. Pressure-treated wood has been used effectively for decades in various applications on five continents. From industrial structures, utility poles, water towers to home foundations and beach boardwalks. Pressure-treated wood has clearly demonstrated its ability to withstand natural deterioration

Going Green And SUSTAINABILITY

Wood is our most sustainable raw material. As a building material, its credentials are unparalleled. Wood results in far less carbon dioxide emissions into the atmosphere than competing building products.

item.title: About Us
item.description: Sunburst Pools is a full service pool company for in ground and above ground pools. Service includes: Opening and closing, cleaning services…
item.content:encoded:
Sunburst Pools is a full service pool company for in ground and above ground pools.

Service includes: Opening and closing, cleaning services, repair and replacement of equipment, pool covers (winter, solar and automatic). leak detection and repair, vinyl replacement, rehabson Sun Holiday, Kayak and Olympic pools.

InAddition: We are also a full service Spa company. Service Includer: Repair and replacement of equipment, cleaning services, removal and or setup, leak detection and new spa cover replacements.

Whatever your Poolor Spa “Needs”, New or Old; Visit us at 12981 National Rd. SW., Etna OH 43062 Phone: (740) 927-9686

Thanks you from all of us, Sunburst Pools “Changing every backyard one pool at a time”

At SUNBURST POOLS we are different than most “POOL STORES” I consider ourselves a “company”. You just do not come to our location and receive an 8x10 glossy of pools and or products. We will talk to you, ask you what you are looking for & take our time with you and listen to what either your issues with your current pool may be or just give you information and help educate you on your pool operation and or water chemistry. We will listen to what you are striving to accomplish with a new pool. We try to make this as stress free as possbile to enable you to enjoy your pool, family and summer.

You will see videos of US doing the work. You can see the work being performed. We DESIGN pools for you & not just offer what our suppliers carry, as many other locations must do. You are purchasing (in our wood pool line) direct from us, the manufacturer, which saves you money. We can also deliver water for your needs. You also will be shown our manufacturing facility where you will see your pool being manufactured just for you, not just a “cookie cutter” product as many others offer. This is what sets SUNBURST POOLS above the rest. We strive to exceed your expectations.

As owner, I take personal interest in you, our clients, for without you, I know and I will never forget, we have nothing. Please stop by and talk to me and see what we can do for you. From new pool builds both in ground, above ground or on ground, to service or to rehab a pool that you may have felt was a total loss or just to express your thoughts. Here at SUNBURST POOLS we will try to meet and exceed your expectations. That is our goal and I would like to thank you for taking your time to look at our web site and hear our story. Your opinion is valuable to me and I hope to hear from you. I know you have many choices, but for you to take your valuable time with us, I THANK YOU!.

Joe Wagner - Owner and Founder, Sunburst Pools.

item.title: Liner Replacements
item.description: Any Size…Any Shape! All Premium Liners used by Sunburst Pools for replacement are manufactured in the USA from premium quality virgin vinyl…
item.content:encoded:
Any Size…Any Shape!

All Premium Liners used by Sunburst Pools for replacement are manufactured in the USA from premium quality virgin vinyl, the liner is designed with enough flexibility to fit attractively into a pool, yet strong enough to last for years. All seams and edges are electronically lap welded by a special process employing “State-Of-The-Art” radio frequency.

Every liner has ultra violet (UV) inhibitors helping them to hold up to the harsh environment in your pool and resistance to sunlight, bacteria, fungus, chemicals and the cold.

We can fix any pool

No matter how bad the job is, we can take a pool like this…

And make it into a pool like this with a simple service call from Sunburst Pools…

Premium Liners Available

Several Patterns And Colors To Choose From…Here are just a few examples.

item.title: Pool Restorations
item.description: No Project Is To Small For Sunburst Pools Look at one of our recent before/after images. Before After Why Choose Sunburst Pools to Restore…
item.content:encoded:
No Project Is To Small For Sunburst Pools

Look at one of our recent before/after images.

Before

After

Why Choose Sunburst Pools to Restore Your Pool?

Whether you are looking for a basic restoration or a complete redesign, Sunburst Pools is dedicated to fulfilling all your swimming pool remodeling needs. No project is too large, too small or too difficult for the Central Ohio leading pool restoration company. With over 30 years experience in pool restoration projects around Columbus and east of Columbus, Sunburst Pools extensive experience consists of a wide variety of types of projects. And no matter who built your swimming pool, Sunburst Pools can help you restore it.

Pool Experts With 30 Years Experience

No one will ever be “learning” on your swimming pool restoration project.

You Get Commitment and Reliability

Simply put - we arrive when we say we will, unless something exceptional happens. Your time is precious, and we respect that

The Best In Customer Service

We commmunicate as clearly and specifically as possible - what we’re going to do for you, when we’ll be doing it, and how it will be done.

item.title: Steel Wall Inground
item.description: We at Sunburst Pools, know pools. Our experience in installing superior quality inground steel pools provides you with the widest range of…
item.content:encoded:
We at Sunburst Pools, know pools. Our experience in installing superior quality inground steel pools provides you with the widest range of shapes and sizes to meet your individual needs.

Steel wall Inground Pool Specifications

Our steel wall pools are available in unlimited shapes and sizes. We have over 200 standard pools sizes to fit perfectly into your backyard. But, in case you want a custom style or size, we can design it for you!

Features

  • 14 Gauge
  • Highest Zinc Coating Available in the Industry (G-235)
  • 5” Top and Bottom Flange

Coping

Our aluminium coping provides full liner lock on all coping styles. That includes poured concrete, wooden or paver style decks.

Premium Liner

Manufactured in the USA from premium quality virgin vinyl, the liner is designed with enough flexibility to fit attractively into a pool, yet strong enough to last for years, plus, we offer pet friendly liners. All seams and edges are lap welded electronically by a special process, and designs are the result of extensive research and experience.

Plumbing

All fittings are schedule 40-80 products made of durable PVC material. All pools are equipped with fully adjustable return wall fittings that direct the filtered water flow to any area of the pool for optimum circulation. A molded, non-corrosive automatic surface skimmer helps to keep the water’s surface free of debris. All plumbing lines are made up of PVC pipe for durability and longevity.

Filter and Pump

All pool filters and pumps fittings offer the pool owners more control over their pools and a better swimming experience day and night.
